title: can I teach ghidra ARM's MSRs?
content:
I have this instruction in the code:

00 cc 38 d5 mrs x0,sreg(0x3, 0x0, c0xc, c0xc, 0x0)

putting the bytecode into disassmbler, I get: mrs x0, icc_iar1_el1 so ghidra does not recognize this icc_iar1_el1 register. is it possible to teach it?

Note that other registers, such as tpidr_el0 for example, are recognized without any problem.

thanks.
